summary.description: A multigenome platform with information on genomes and gene annotations from different tomato cultivars. This platform includes genomes from Heinz 1706, Lucariello and Corbarino (tomato landaraces) with related genome browsers and transcriptomic data. It gives free access to the recently sequenced Italian tomato varieties and offers tools for their comparative analysis. (Tranchida-Lombardo et al., â€Ž2017; https://doi.org/10.1093/dnares/dsx045)
summary.name: Genotom
